"Task envy" - A feature that allows users to see how others have completed their tasks, complete with timestamps and screenshots, to help them feel less alone in their work.
"Virtual workshop" - A virtual space where users can collaborate on tasks and share their work in real-time, complete with virtual whiteboards, chat rooms, and file sharing capabilities.
"Task completion badges" - A gamification feature that awards users with virtual badges when they complete a task, providing a sense of accomplishment and motivation to continue working.
"AI-powered task assistant" - An AI-powered tool that learns the user's workflow and provides personalized suggestions and recommendations for completing tasks more efficiently.

"Mentorship program" - A feature that connects users with experienced professionals in their field, allowing them to learn from their peers and gain valuable insights into completing tasks more efficiently.
